question: Name two notable lakes surrounding Trakai, Lithuania.
true_answer: Galvė Lake and Lukos Lake (also known as Bernardinų Lake).
asked_question_translated: Nombra dos lagos notables que rodean Trakai, Lituania.
answer: Lagos notables que rodean Trakai, Lituania, son el Lago Galvė y el Lago de Trakai.
answer_translated_eng: Notable lakes surrounding Trakai, Lithuania, are Lake Galvė and Lake Trakai.
